response.overview: Ryota Nonomiya is a successful businessman driven by money. He learns that his biological son was switched with another child after birth. He must make a life-changing decision and choose his true son or the boy he raised as his own.
response.tagline: At what point does a father truly become a father?
response.title: Like Father, Like Son
